line.text: Select one of the two
heroes to start your adventure
To move the camera you can
place the mouse at the borders
of the screen or use the arrow keys
Now go to your town hall
It is at the center of the map
This is your town hall
Your objective is to defend it
Click it or press space to select it
Press space twice to center the camera
Here you can create more buildings
Start by building your first Lumber Mill
You have to place it near to a forest
to get as much wood as possible
You can assign workers to this building
to increase your production
Here you can see your total wood
And the amount that you collect every 3 seconds
Select your lumber mill
to assign more workers
To assign more workers, click the plus
button or use the ones above the building
Now wait until you have enough resources
and build a farm to get more workers
Some enemies have appeared
They will try to destroy your village
Select your hero by clicking it
or pressing TAB
Press TAB twice to center the camera
Right click on a position to move
your selected troops there
Defeat the enemies using your abilities
Use the buttons or press: Q, W or E (default)
Here you can see the enemies that
will come in the next wave and when
Before they come we have to prepare an army
Build the barracks
In that building, you can train
your workers to become soldiers
I have to go to defend Storm Wind!
Now that you know the basics
you can defend the village
Good luck!
